info.description: The Eastern Greek Orthodox New Testament
info.detailed_info: Cleenewerck, Laurent - EOB · The Eastern Greek Orthodox New Testament · Based on the Official Text of the Greek Orthodox Church (Patriarchal Text of 1904)
